Trade/Device Name(s): Gold Standard Diagnostics Antinuclear Antibody (ANA) Screen ELISA Test
Gold Standard Diagnostics Anti-nuclear Antibody (ANA) Screen Elisa Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics Antinuclear Antibody (ANA) Screen ELISA Test Kit for qualitative detection of ANAs in human serum using ELISA technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative assay for detection of antinuclear antibodies in human serum as an aid in the diagnosis of systemic lupus erythematosus, mixed connective tissue disease, Sjögren's syndrome, progressive systemic sclerosis, and polymyositis/dermatomyositis, used in conjunction with other laboratory tests and clinical findings.
